Overview.Title: Write the Next Sentence in the Story
Overview.FormattedContent:
Continue the Ever Turking Story.

Overview

This is part of a crowd sourcing project to write a story. Four people will read the latest several sentences of the story and write the next sentence. Seven other people will vote on which of the four sentences is best. The winning sentence gets added to the story and the cycle repeats again.

The story should be written as an over-the-top noir mystery with a dry sense of humor.

Story Setting

The story takes place in a sprawling generic city called Generic City located somewhere in the western USA. The time period is current. It is the month of August. The story should take place within the span of a few weeks at most. Generic City has a lot of suburbs, malls, small office buildings, small public buildings, etc. It has an central industrial section with old, tall brick buildings which are just starting to be gentrified.

The Characters

Raspian

Raspian is a twenty-something male hipster who looks a bit like a young Rasputin. He lives semi-legally in a loft in one of the industrial buildings that is mostly abandoned along with his girlfriend Hazel. Rasputin is intellectual, outside-the-system, and is clever at building things with available parts. He works as a highly specialized metal worker for a small company that fixes nearly-antique equipment. Raspian is a fearless introvert.

Hazel

Hazel is an upscale clothing retail worker from Beijing, China. Short and athletic with perfectly silky medium length black hair, guys hit on her constantly. Hazel works hard to stay current with trends and fashions. It was Hazel's idea to move into the loft; she has ideas and plans.

The Situation

Raspian returns home late from work to find that someone has left a note on the entrance to his loft saying "We have your monkey. Meet us at the dark end of Danger Street at midnight or the monkey loses his suit and tie." This makes no sense because neither Raspian nor Hazel have even seen a monkey outside of a zoo, especially one wearing a suit and tie. The GPS shows danger street in the middle of the old industrial section of Generic City.

Your Job

Below you will find the latest sentences in the story. You will write a sentence to continue the story. You should avoid jerking the story around randomly. You should accept completely whatever the previous sentences say, no matter how ridiculous. Keep in mind that you are competing with four other people who are also writing the next sentence. Seven other Turker workers will vote on which one they like best.

Good luck!

Payment Structure

You will receive the princely sum of one cent for writing a sentence. If your sentence is selected in the voting, then you will receive an additional 5 cents.
